statements: SELECT user_id, login_time, ip_address, success, failure_reason, is_suspicious FROM login_attempts;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM login_attempts ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM login_attempts GROUP BY ip_address;
SELECT user_id, failure_reason FROM login_attempts WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM login_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT user_id, login_time, failure_reason FROM login_attempts WHERE failure_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS attempts_count FROM login_attempts GROUP BY ip_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT ip_address FROM login_attempts WHERE is_suspicious = true;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM suspicious_attempts;
SELECT status, user_id FROM login_attempts WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_attempts WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, login_time, status FROM login_attempts ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_time, status FROM login_attempts WHERE status='failed' ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, status FROM login_attempts WHERE status='blocked' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM login_attempts WHERE login_time >= '2021-12-01' AND login_time <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, status, reason FROM suspicious_attempts WHERE status='flagged' AND reason LIKE '%suspicious%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts JOIN suspicious_attempts ON login_attempts.user_id = suspicious_attempts.user_id WHERE login_attempts.status = 'failed' AND suspicious_attempts.status = 'flagged';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts;
SELECT username, login_timestamp FROM login_attempts WHERE ip_address = '10.20.30.40';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM login_attempts;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_logins ORDER BY flag_timestamp DESC;
SELECT flag_id, status FROM flagging_status WHERE flagger = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, login_timestamp FROM login_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, reason FROM suspicious_logins ORDER BY flag_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM flagging_status WHERE status = 'flagged' AND flagger = 'admin' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT ip_address, COUNT(*) as login_count FROM login_attempts GROUP BY ip_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts;
SELECT username, login_time FROM suspicious_logins WHERE reason IS NULL;
SELECT ip_address, login_time FROM login_attempts WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.0.1' ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT username, login_time FROM suspicious_logins WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT u.username, ur.role FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, login_time, success FROM login_history ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, reason FROM suspicious_logins WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1' LIMIT 5;
SELECT flag_name, flag_description FROM flags WHERE flag_name = 'important_flag';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY time DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS attempts FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY attempts DESC;
SELECT u.username, h.login_time, h.success FROM users u JOIN login_history h ON u.id = h.user_id WHERE h.success = TRUE ORDER BY h.login_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, ip_address, reason FROM suspicious_logins WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%' ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT f.flag_name, f.flag_description, COUNT(s.id) AS count FROM flags f LEFT JOIN suspicious_logins s ON f.id = s.id GROUP BY f.flag_name, f.flag_description ORDER BY count DESC;
